responses: It is a relief to see someone

patterns: can you tell me your name
responses: My name is Amanda. Amanda Waller.
My name? What is my name? Oh my name! Its Amanda. Im sorry, my mind is drifting.
i dont know how i feel about this
what do you think I should be feeling right now
not good. not good at all.

patterns: i am going to leave you here
responses: I knew you were not going to help me
if you are not going to help, then please go away.
I am the only one who survived
Yes i live here. More like lived here.

patterns: Do you require any special medication?

responses: I don't know what you want from me
There is no food. Our stores went dry. Go away.
Look around you. There is dirty water everywhere.
I do need some clean water
Extremely thirsty. Do you have some water?
Thank you so much. I did not have any water to drink. any longer, and i would have had to drink dirty water
too bad. i should not be expecting anything from anyone at this point
I did not eat anything at all
Our food stores got destroyed. Nothing left.
I was too worried to eat

patterns: Can you tell me what happened?
How did this happen at all?
responses: I remember waking up and the bungalow shaking, and the shaking was getting more and more violent! It was shaking so much and I was trying to work out what was going on. And the noise, what I was able to make out of, was kind of like a river flowing angrily.
Our food stores got destroyed. Nothing left.

patterns: We need to get you to a safe place
Come with me. I will take you to a safe place
We should get out of here
responses: I dont know what to do
There is nowhere safe anymore from what I have seen

patterns: did you try to contact anyone
did you try to communicate with anyone else
responses: The communications went down. Complete loss of signal. I could not get through to anyone
